Families have always come first at Marriott. one of the ways we demonstrate this priority is by supporting Children’s Miracle network (CMn), a non-profit organization dedicated to raising funds and awareness for more than 170 children’s hospitals in the united States and Canada. these hospitals help 17 million children each year battle diseases and injuries of every kind. in 1983, Marriott helped elevate awareness  of CMn when it became the organization’s first corporate sponsor. in collaboration with guests, business partners and associates, we’ve raised more than $71 million to help chil-dren needing hospitalization in our communities.
